tool_description: PDF Fusion Plus is a powerful API service designed to streamline your PDF merging needs. With our service, you can effortlessly merge  PDF files into a single document, and insert one PDF inside another. Whether you're dealing with multi-page PDFs or smaller files, our service ensures seamless integration, maintaining the integrity of your original documents. Simplify your PDF management process with PDF Fusion Plus and enjoy efficient, hassle-free merging capabilities.
name: PDF Fusion Plus
title: PDF Fusion Plus

api_list.name: Create virtual pdf
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pdf-fusion-plus.p.rapidapi.com/api/multi_merge_pdf"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pdf-fusion-plus.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://pdf-fusion-plus.p.rapidapi.com/api/multi_merge_pdf"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pdf-fusion-plus.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Insert page to pdf
Add page to virtual pdf

required_parameters.name: page_index
required_parameters.description: The number of page. This field will be used for ordering

required_parameters.name: uuid
required_parameters.description: The uuid of the virtual pdf

api_list.name: Quick merge pdf
